AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Giga Factory Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was grown and raised at industrial gene-engineering complex like most Vulpians. {PAWN_pronoun} has spent an entire childhood being taught routine tasks, etiquette and how to please {PAWN_possessive} future owners.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Regular Childhood
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was adopted at very young age and has spent an entire childhood outside the walls of giga factory in {PAWN_possessive} owner's family...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of Freedom
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was lucky enough to be raised by {PAWN_possessive} biological mother and father that managed to escape and to obtain their freedom.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Genius Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} has passed a complex of standard intelligence tests with marvellous results. {PAWN_nameDef}'s intelligence abilities are well-known vulpian anomaly and is highly valued among glitterworld scientific communities and institutes. {PAWN_nameDef} got freedom after their test and was sent into educational complex together with other vulpian geniuses to study and to push technological progress.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: First Batch
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was grown at the very first gene-engineering complex located at the Vulpian homeworld before it ascended into an Archotech planet. Scientists didn't knew about the intelligence potential of Vulpians back then. As in result {PAWN_nameDef}`s mind is not affected either by destructive drugs or propaganda machine. Nobody knows how {PAWN_pronoun} managed to live out till today, but {PAWN_pronoun} is a relic of a vulpian and it's homeworld past, that's for sure.
